Articles.Content:
Not 100% accurate, but hey.

Requires KAX and FAR. Performance in stock aerodynamics unknown.

The props in KAS tended to be a bit too big for the stock landing gear, so I decided to use history as a solution. It handles reasonably enough, able to preform most maneuvers with little to no stalling for a rather tight turn radius. Can be a little hard to land, it needs to bleed out a good amount of energy and it glides a bit too well.
